Description:
So Much Space & A Gorgeous Garden Setting!
Delightfully situated to enjoy the apparent seclusion, desirable tranquillity and open grassy areas that the exclusive 'Central Gardens' cul-de-sac is known for, 'number 10' will further impress with its prized position at the very rear of the estate, delivering a most engaging first impression with its attractive brick facade and inviting full-width verandah certain to captivate owner occupiers of all ages!
Without compromising on space or functionality, the single level villa will assuredly 'wow' with the profuse sense of roominess both inside and out, the excellent presentation and perfect position on its tidily landscaped 670sqm (approx.) allotment delivering enjoyable areas for family recreation and outdoor enjoyment, along with mature greenery providing lovely outlooks and a private screening.
Inside, naturally light infused interiors are further highlighted by the rich Jarrah tones of floating floorboards, flowing throughout the generously proportioned layout encompassing a sizeable living area enhanced further by large windows framing the scenery outside, and extending through into the large, open plan timber kitchen (well-appointed with plentiful cabinetry and benchspace, a breakfast bar and dishwasher). Integrating seamlessly is the north facing family zone or meals area further featuring sliding doors opening out for effortless entertaining to the sublime two-tiered undercover alfresco patio and the fully secure and private rear gardens certain to add an additional level of allure.
Furthermore, a separate toilet and spotless family bathroom amply services two comfortable bedrooms, both with built-in robes and enjoying picturesque views, and the elegant master, facing the rear gardens, is complemented with walk-through robing to a bright full ensuite.
Additional highlights list as; gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling and ceiling fans, downlights, modern window and floor coverings including plush carpet to bedrooms, a separate laundry with external access, outdoor awnings, gardens shed, off-street parking and a double lock-up carport with gated access to gardens.
Walk to childcare and buses, Tintern Grammar and Tinternvale Primary, Eastfield Mall, Merrindale Shopping Centre and Tarralla Creek walking trails granting access via Eastfield Park to Swinburne TAFE, Croydon township cafés, shops. train station and recreational facilities including swimming pools; with easy access to Ringwood Secondary and Aquinas Colleges, Aquanation Leisure Centre, Eastland Shopping Centre, the EastLink freeway, Dandenong Ranges and Yarra Valley.
A superior residence for the quick-acting first homebuyer, executive couple, downsizer or investor, be sure to arrange your inspection today!
